mapper.select: select * from wtm_member_invited_record r WHERE r.memberId=#{memberId};

select m.imageUrl imageUrl,m.memberName memberName,s.memberScore,r.createTime invitedTime from wtm_member m LEFT JOIN wtm_member_invited_record r ON r.memberId=m.id LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score s ON s.memberId=m.id WHERE r.parentId=#{parentID};

SELECT CASE WHEN sum(history.pointCount) is null THEN 0 ELSE sum(history.pointCount) END AS totalScore, (SELECT pointCount FROM wtm_member_task WHERE id=3) invitedScore FROM wtm_member_task_history history LEFT JOIN wtm_member_task task ON task.id = history.taskId WHERE history.memberId =#{memberId} AND task.id IN (3,7);

SELECT sum(h.pointCount) shareCounts, m.memberName memberName, m.imageUrl imageUrl FROM wtm_member_task_history h LEFT JOIN wtm_member_task t ON t.id = h.taskId LEFT JOIN wtm_member m ON m.id = h.memberId WHERE t.id IN (3, 7) GROUP BY h.memberId ORDER BY shareCounts DESC,m.createTime ASC LIMIT 10
